definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Sometimes story, take on the piano chords try.
sentences.chinese: 有時也煞有介事，拿着簡譜在鋼琴上摩拳擦掌。

sentences.english: To our surprise, she was good enough to play many songs just by seeing the numbered musical notation.
sentences.chinese: 令我們驚訝的是，她看着簡譜就能吹好多歌曲了。

sentences.english: This page is for all the Mandarin songs. All the songs have complete lyrics and song chords .
sentences.chinese: 所有歌曲都附上完整的歌詞和歌曲簡譜。

definition: vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
to praise the virtue of sb or sth while concealing their faults
lit. so loud that even the deaf can hear (idiom); rousing even the apathetic
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
